== Tagging of Audio Bugs ==
This page describes the tags that are applied to audio bugs.

=== Symptom Classification ===

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| '''Tag'''
| '''Description'''
|-
| mic-int
| The internal microphone is not working.
|-
| mic-ext
| The external microphone is not working.
|-
| usb-speakers
| The sound issue is with usb speakers.
|-
| surround-broken
| Issue reported against surround sound not working.
|-
| no-sound-headphones
| Headphones are not working though other audio is.
|-
| no-sound-speakers
| Builtin speakers are not working.
|-
| usb-soundcard
| The issue is with a usb soundcard.
|-
| quirk-needed
| A new quirk is required to fix the reported issue.
|}
